page.title: 14PUBLIC AMENITIES IN CLOPHILL
page.content:
The most used{Amenity}is of course the {Village Hall.}Almost all the village organisations hire it for their plays, dances, meetings & sales. Every June we hold a{fete}to raise money for the upkeep of the hall. There is a parade of decorated floats,fancydress,races, stalls,sideshows and a beer tent.
The{School hall}is also available for hire.
We have a block of selfcontained{flats for{retired people}at{Beverley Court. If there is an emergency a{Warden}is on duty to render assistance. Many would have to lose their independence if there was no{sheltered accomodation
We have a{travelling library}which visits several village locations once a fortnight.
